name: essentials-claude-code
description: Multi-agent orchestration framework for Claude Code. Complete 5-stage workflow with context chain: Plan (source of truth) → proposal-creator → beads-creator → beads-loop. Each stage preserves full implementation code, exit criteria, and back-references for recovery. Implementation loops that iterate until complete.
author: GantisStorm

plugins.name: essentials
plugins.description: 15 commands, 10 agents. Context chain: Plan → Spec → Beads. Each bead is 100% self-contained (50-200+ lines of code) - loop agent never needs to read spec or plan. Full Reference Implementation preserved through entire pipeline. LSP-powered via Claude Code built-in LSP.
